name: Manitoba Poison
description: Manitoba Poison is a 50/50 hybrid with heavy indica properties that vastly outweigh its sativa counterpart. Its effects arrive instantaneously, delivering deep relaxation that easily converts to a good nightâ€™s sleep. The rounded, purple-fringed buds are wreathed in dark jade leaves and have a fresh, woody aroma that carries through until the exhale. Bred by Great White North from unnamed African varieties, Manitoba Poison thrives outdoors in temperate northern climates and grows about 4 feet tall.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Sleepy, Focused, Uplifted, Stress, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid
